Great prompt, affordable service. They came out and fixed my drain issues right the first time.

review.comment: Mark did a great job thank you for everything

review.comment: King Rooter & Plumbing is the best. We had a leak somewhere in the kitchen we couldn't locate and scheduled their services.  First, they called to see if they could arrive early. Mark was extremely professional. He explained everything as he went and took the time to show me exactly what he found. He provided advice and I felt I could really trust him and this business. He fixed the leak and upgraded a couple of items I requested while he was here. Would definitely use them again and would refer them to anyone else!
review.review_reply: Lisa thank you for the wonderful review. Mark is a good hard-working technician and takes pride in doing the best quality work for his customer. We hope you have a blessed day and we’re always here in the future once again thank you from us at King Rooter And Plumbing

review.comment: Warning: This company will severely overcharge you for services rendered and attempt to sell you services you are not in need of. We used this company to unclog our sewer line to the tune of $570. They charged us an exorbitant amount for this service and then told us that our pipes were so damaged we needed $18,000 worth of repairs. We then contacted another company for a second opinion and were shocked to find that a) they only charged $165 to unclog a line and b) there was absolutely no need to repair our sewer lines. Too bad the ratings don't allow for zero stars because this company doesn't deserve the one star review.
review.review_reply:
We are sorry that you weren’t happy with price. We pride ourselves on always provide up front pricing, with 3 options before we ever start a job. You did have the option to pick an option that was lower priced. However you and your husband picked the Best option which was the higher priced option. Once our technician was done and pulled out roots along with trash, we do provide a findings recommendation to help prevent further problems in the future. As you could see upon that estimate we also provided once again 3 options for a permanent solution to stop the back ups again. We pride ourselves in given the best experience to our customers with the Best, Better and good options, so that our customers can work with their budget. The Estimate we provided were just recommendations for the future if you decided to correct the issue before your drain lines became none repairable. We apologize if you were not happy with the 3 additional options and recommendations we provided for a future fix. In our profession we know the good sewer lines don’t usually back up, it’s ultimately an issue in your line that is creating back ups.

Thank you King Rooter

review.comment: He is a professional plumber, which makes things a lot easier for us. He'll undoubtedly be used again. Arrived on time and performed beautifully. excellent 👍
review.review_reply: Hey Levi we appreciate your awesome review and thank you for letting us serve you.

review.comment: Great and speedy service. Replaced my sewer ejector pump. Diagnosed the problem and had the new pump installed the next day. He was very tidy and knowledgeable as well.  I will use them again!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Patty for taking the time to let us know about your great experience that you had with our technician Derek and King Rooter Plumbing. We look forward to assisting you with your future plumbing needs.

review.comment: Charles was professional, kind and efficient.  He had all my repairs done quickly, professionally and on New Years Eve!  I definitely recommend him and this company!  Thank you!!!

review.comment: Derek had an outstanding work ethic. He hustles and was super competent, the guy knew what he was doing. He led a team that pulled down some industrial heaters; not easy work. Fully recommend

review.comment: We are satisfied with this service. They unclogged our sink and left no mess behind. I liked their cleanliness. fantastic and admirable service

review.comment:
"Great company, extremely professional.
My tankless water heater, as it turns out, did not need to be serviced.  JMS arrived on time and  did not charge me for the service call.  I highly recommend this company."
review.review_reply: Thank you for sharing your experience with us James. We are very happy that we were able to resolve your issue and are very excited that everything is working as expected

review.comment: Great service
review.review_reply: Lisa, thank you for such a great review! Feel free to reach out if there’s anything else we can help you with! Thank you for your business!

review.comment: Our sewer line had a HUGE meltdown that came out of nowhere (or so we thought). The line had been inspected a year prior when we bought the house and it was *fine*. It was 100% not fine. After cleaning up a lot of poo, we called King Rooter on the recommendation from Good To Go Sanitation and they not only helped us, they came out that week and did a trenchless sewer line repair. Our line was a bit of a bear and had some surprises (sorry, King Rooter!), but it's done and we're happy! Thank you!
review.review_reply: Sarah, thank you for such a great review! Feel free to reach out if there’s anything else we can help you with! Thank you for your business!

review.comment: This was our 2nd time using King Rooter & Plumbing and they again did amazing work.  They were responsive, showed up on time, and fixed the problem in under an hour.  Derek is extremely professional and explained the issues we had and got all our drains running again!  They will always be my first call for any plumbing needs in the future.
review.review_reply: Thanks Michael! We appreciate you so much!!!. We appreciate your business. Feel free to reach out to us if there’s anything else we could help you with!

review.comment: The guys at King Rooter did a fast and fabulous job on repairing my sewer line. Yay!
review.review_reply: Kitty, thank you for your positive review. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with the services provided to you and a recommendation from a current customer is the best compliment we can get.

review.comment: Bottom line up front - The techs who did the work on my ancient main line were thorough, efficient, detail oriented, clearly explained every step of the Nu Flow liner process and clearly understood what they were doing.  Who were they? Derek, Tony and Robert; a pleasure to work with and I hope to see the same team back in the future.  In the future you ask?  Al, who was the estimator, is a very detailed person, low key and easy to talk to.  We all surveyed the completed installation which solved my immediate problems, and looked at the areas that need to be addressed in the future, the under-street service... like I said,  ancient main line.  Thanks guys, I hope to see you all again to fix the next part.
review.review_reply: Peter, thank you for your positive review. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with the services provided to you and a recommendation from a current customer is the best compliment we can get.
Johnny we're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

review.comment: We are very impressed with the quick response to our need for service today. We appreciated the clear communication with office staff and professional staff who came to our home.
review.review_reply: Nanette, thank you for your positive review. We are happy to hear that you were satisfied with the services provided to you and a recommendation from a current customer is the best compliment we can get.
Thanks so much Danielle, We really appreciate the kind words and are thrilled to hear that we were able to provide you with a positive experience. Take care and have a great day!
Thank you!
